description: Try our easy to follow Apple Crumble - Gluten Free & Flourless recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Apple Crumble - Gluten Free & Flourless Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the gluten-free crumble, place butter, walnuts, almond meal, quinoa flakes, coconut, spice, vanilla and syrup in a food processor and pulse until nuts are chopped but not too fine so that there is some texture. Scatter over the apple and date mixture. Bake for 35-40 minutes or until golden and apple is tender. Stand for 5 minutes before serving. Serve with thick cream, if using. Tip 1: Use rolled oats instead of quinoa flakes in this recipe. You can use dried dates if fresh are unavailable. Tip 2: This crumble is great served in plastic airtight containers cold in lunch boxes the next day. Tip 3: This dessert can be made in individual ramekins.
